price: Ele disse: "Ó dignitários! Quem de vós me fará vir seu trono, antes que me cheguem como muçulmanos, submissos?"
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَيُّكُمۡ يَأۡتِينِي بِعَرۡشِهَا قَبۡلَ أَن يَأۡتُونِي مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāayyuhā al-mala-u ayyukum yatīnī biʿarshihā qabla an yatūnī mus'limīna
